sourcesContent:
# Type
{{ type.id }} {{ type.name }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Type } from '../type' import { TypeService } from '../type-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-type-list', templateUrl: './type-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./type-list.component.css'] }) export class TypeListComponent { types: Type[]; constructor(private typeService: TypeService) { } ngOnInit() { this.typeLoadAll(); } onDelete(id: string){ this.typeService.delete(id).subscribe(result => { this.typeLoadAll(); }); } typeLoadAll(){ this.typeService.findAll().subscribe(data => { this.types = data; }); } }
